resources.string: "View files by type from our brand new home screen."
"%1$s invites you to download and install ASUS File Manager"

"ASUS File Manager is the ideal way to manage files with your smart phone. This file management app helps you handle and sort through the various files stored in your phone memory, MicroSD card, local area network, and even in the cloud."

"ASUS File Manager lets you access files easily, you can even move, copy, or delete files stored in the cloud. ASUS File Manager works with a number of cloud storage providers including ASUSâ€™s own WebStorage and HomeCloud; as well as Dropbox, Google Drive, and Microsoft OneDrive."
"I've been having fun with ASUS File Manager. Try it NOW! :D"
